description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Although it may not be the most complicated game, Get The Ball could possibly be the most addicting game you'll ever play. The objective is simple: get the ball as quickly as possible. Features intense, fast-paced 4 player gameplay.
description.short: Although it may not be the most complicated game, Get The Ball could possibly be the most addicting game you'll ever play. The objective is simple: get the ball as quickly as possible. Features intense, fast-paced 4 player gameplay.
